> However, just for future reference this is a sample on how to
> pass parameter into JUnit test cases.

Yes, that's the Parameterized Testcase pattern. Besides the point that the
typical implementation is to put the suite() method into the MyTest class,
which allows test collectors to recognize that the MyTest tests are
collected through the suite() method. Perhaps that's causing your problem?
What happens if you do this?

Cheers, Ilja
